MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry Find(string name) cil managed
Public Function Find (name As String) As DirectoryEntry

param.name: name
param.span: 包含要搜尋的子物件名稱。

span.span: Contains the name of the child object for which to search.

summary.span: 傳回具有指定之名稱的這個集合成員。

span.span: Returns the member of this collection with the specified name.
A that represents the child object that was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不同類型的子物件具有相同的名稱，則會傳回第一個相符的子物件。If child objects of different types have the same name, the first matching child object is returned. > [!NOTE] > Internet Information Services (IIS) 提供者不支援這個方法。The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support this method. 使用多載方法並指定空字串 ("") 為`schemaClassName`參數。Use the overloaded method and specify an empty string ("") for the `schemaClassName` parameter. > > 如果不找到任何相符的結果，則0x2030 的程式碼擲回錯誤。If no matching result is found, a with error code 0x2030 is thrown.

exception.span: Active Directory 網域服務物件不是容器。

span.span: The Active Directory Domain Services object is not a container.

exception.span: 呼叫基礎介面期間發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.

span.span: A object that represents the child object that was found.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SchemaFilter As SchemaNameCollection

summary.span: 取得指定哪些子物件包含於集合中的結構描述。

span.span: Gets the schemas that specify which child objects are contained in the collection.

value.span: ，指定哪些子物件包含於 執行個體。

span.span: A that specifies which child objects are contained in the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是空的所有類型的子物件會顯示在集合中; 否則只有其中一個指定的型別會顯示。If the property is empty, child objects of all types are visible in the collection; otherwise, only those of the specified types are visible.
